Token.Abstract: Used to provide access to the persistent store coordiantor, and for easy setup when the app being developed uses the standard settings for the data model
Ominpresent accessor for the default persistent store coordiantor
Setter for the default persistent store coordiantor, to allow for customizing the coordinator as needed by your application

Parameter.Name: coordinator
Parameter.Abstract: The new coordinator to be used by the framework

Token.Abstract: Convenience selector for retrieving a managedObjectModel given a name and bundle

Parameter.Name: modelName
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the model (excluding the extension)

Parameter.Name: bundle
Parameter.Abstract: The NSBundle where the model can be found (for a nil value, the main bundle will be used)

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: Any errors that occur will be populated to this address

ReturnValue.Abstract: The NSManagedObjectModel found for the name and bundle provided, or nil

Token.Abstract: A lookup function to determine the NSEntityDescription that is mapped to a given class

Parameter.Name: class
Parameter.Abstract: The class to retrieve the entity description for

ReturnValue.Abstract: The NSEntityDescription that maps to the class provided

Token.Abstract: A convenience method for configuring a default sqllite3 store.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: Any errors that occur will be populated to this address

ReturnValue.Abstract: A boolean indicating success or failure
